```{r,message=FALSE,warning=FALSE}
library(bench)
library(devtools)
load_all('./')

A<-matrix(rnorm(400),nrow=20)
B<-matrix(rnorm(400),nrow=20)
x<-runif(20)

(lb <- bench::mark(
  product(A,B,x,1),
  product(A,B,x,2)
))

plot(lb)

```

It seems that the second way of computing the product is much faster and saves more memoryã€‚
